context.name: FAB Defense Versatile Tactical Support
context.excerpt: The VTS Versatile Tactical Support from FAB Defense provides a large variety of solutions for forward grip positioning, enhancing comfort and increasing accuracy.
context.content:
The FAB Defense Versatile Tactical Support provides a large variety of solutions for forward grip positioning, enhancing comfort and increasing accuracy.

This ergonomic support can be set in multiple locations for a wide variety of tactical needs and ideal operational superiority, taking in mind ideal compact configuration.

 

FAB Defense Versatile Tactical Support Advantages:

Allows Optimal Personal Configuration of Your Rifle
Fits on All 1913 Picatinny Rails
Improves Weapon Control and Ergonomics
Permits Safe and Efficient use in Extreme Operational Scenarios
Can be used Complimentary to the PTK as a Thumb Support

 

Versatile Tactical Support Compatibility:

Fits on All 1913 MIL-STD Picatinny rails
